page.title: 12Offwell Primary School
page.content: A small Church school consisting of 3 buildings and 3 small playgrounds. The original school room, built in 1840, from flint and stone has stone mullioned windows. In the East window there is a stained glass design inscribed, 'Our life is what our thoughts make it'. Over the entrance porch, are the words 'The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom'. St Mary's Church Hall is on the same site. It is used by the school during the day and by the villagers during evenings and weekends. It is also used as a Polling Station. The school has its own swimming pool and is attended by 38 children from {Offwell, Wilmington}and{Cotleigh. The school has 2 teachers, a part-time secretary and 2 dinner staff.
